title: Emerald Bloom Grand Haaram - A Timeless Statement Piece
materials: square-cut Emeralds. Accented with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine. Total Gold Weight: 80.080 grams; Total Diamond Weight: 3.11 carats; Total Emerald Weight: 18.87 carats.
features: This exquisite haaram features a floral motif, with each 'flower' intricately crafted from diamonds surrounding a central, meticulously-cut emerald. The setting provides exceptional sparkle and showcases the emerald's lush green hue. The design seamlessly blends traditional Telugu jewelry aesthetics with a contemporary setting, creating a timeless piece.
colors: and subtle hints of Yellow Gold beneath the white gold polish.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
and significant celebrations. Adds a touch of regal elegance to modern and traditional attire alike. Suitable for Muhurtham
description: This Emerald Bloom Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and exquisite design. The carefully selected emeralds, combined with the brilliance of the diamonds, create a stunning visual impact. The blend of tradition and modernity makes it a versatile investment piece, suitable for both traditional and contemporary wardrobes. A true heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations.
